    mx = 10 ** 4 + 1
    fac = [1]
    rfac = [1]
    for i in range(1, mx):
        fac.append(fac[-1] * i % mod)
        rfac.append(rfac[-1] * pow(i, -1, mod) % mod)

    def cnk(n, k):
        return fac[n] * rfac[n - k] * rfac[k] % mod
    arr = [0] * (n - m)
    for i in range(m + 1):
        arr.append(2 * i)
    res = 0
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        res += cnk(n, i) * arr[i]
        res %= mod
    return res * k * pow(2, -n, mod) % mod
